title: 04/14/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 04/14/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
After months of doubt, Colin finally realizes why one of the fastest rising prospects in the NFL is destined to land in the top 3. He discusses the Brooklyn Nets as they dominate the East but explains why he has his doubts about their championship hopes. Plus, Fox Sports college football analyst Joel Klatt joins the show to break down the top prospects ahead of the NFL draft.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
